verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

עֲמֹ֗ד <S%H5975><s%> Stand בְּשַׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> in the gate בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S וְקָרָ֣אתָ <S%H7121><s%> and proclaim שָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> there this word הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H559><s%> and say שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> all [ye of] Judah הַבָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> that enter in בַּשְּׁעָרִ֣ים <S%H8179><s%> at these gates הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <S%H7812><s%> to worship לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵיטִ֥יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> Amend דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> your ways וּמַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4611><s%> and your doings וַאֲשַׁכְּנָ֣ה <S%H7931><s%> and I will cause you to dwell אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> בַּמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבְטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> Trust לָכֶ֔ם אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> words הַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> ye not in lying לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הֵיכַ֤ל <S%H1964><s%> The temple יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> The temple יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֵיכַ֥ל <S%H1964><s%> The temple יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> This

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if הֵיטֵיב֙ <S%H3190><s%> For if ye throughly תֵּיטִ֔יבוּ <S%H3190><s%> amend אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1870><s%> your ways וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H4611><s%> and your doings אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if עָשׂ֤וֹ <S%H6213><s%> if ye throughly תַֽעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> execute מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> between a man וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> and his neighbour

גֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> not the stranger יָת֤וֹם <S%H3490><s%> the fatherless וְאַלְמָנָה֙ <S%H490><s%> and the widow לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַֽעֲשֹׁ֔קוּ <S%H6231><s%> [If] ye oppress וְדָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> not innocent אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁפְּכ֖וּ <S%H8210><s%> and shed בַּמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאַחֲרֵ֨י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֧ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֛ים <S%H312><s%> other לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֵלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> walk לְרַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> to your hurt לָכֶֽם׃

וְשִׁכַּנְתִּ֤י <S%H7931><s%> Then will I cause you to dwell אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> to your fathers לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> and ever

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you בֹּטְחִ֣ים <S%H982><s%> Behold ye trust לָכֶ֔ם עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> words הַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> in lying לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> to no הוֹעִֽיל׃ <S%H3276><s%> that cannot profit

הֲגָנֹ֤ב ׀ <S%H1589><s%> Will ye steal רָצֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H7523><s%> murder וְֽנָאֹ֔ף <S%H5003><s%> and commit adultery וְהִשָּׁבֵ֥עַ <S%H7650><s%> and swear לַשֶּׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely וְקַטֵּ֣ר <S%H6999><s%> and burn incense לַבָּ֑עַל <S%H1168><s%> unto Baal וְהָלֹ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and walk אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> other אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> you have not יְדַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> whom ye know

וּבָאתֶ֞ם <S%H935><s%> And come וַעֲמַדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5975><s%> and stand לְפָנַ֗י <S%H6440><s%> before בַּבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> me in this house הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> which is called שְׁמִ֣י <S%H8034><s%> by my name עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> and say נִצַּ֑לְנוּ <S%H5337><s%> We are delivered לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of עֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַתּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <S%H8441><s%> Tolaites הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

הַמְעָרַ֣ת <S%H4631><s%> become a den פָּרִצִ֗ים <S%H6530><s%> of robbers הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַבַּ֧יִת <S%H1004><s%> Is this house הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> has this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִקְרָֽא־ <S%H7121><s%> which is called שְׁמִ֥י <S%H8034><s%> by my name עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> affliction גַּ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> even אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> have seen נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> [it] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> But לְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> go נָ֗א <S%H4994><s%> now אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמִי֙ <S%H4725><s%> ye now unto my place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּשִׁיל֔וֹ <S%H7887><s%> which [was] in Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what שִׁכַּ֧נְתִּֽי <S%H7931><s%> where I set שְׁמִ֛י <S%H8034><s%> my name שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> at בָּרִֽאשׁוֹנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> at the first וּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> and see אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> what I did ל֔וֹ מִפְּנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> to it for רָעַ֖ת <S%H7451><s%> the wickedness עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now יַ֧עַן <S%H3282><s%> because עֲשׂוֹתְכֶ֛ם <S%H6213><s%> And now because ye have done אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּֽעֲשִׂ֥ים <S%H4639><s%> all these works הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וָאֲדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> and I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> to you הַשְׁכֵּ֤ם <S%H7925><s%> unto you rising up early וְדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> and speaking וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H8085><s%> but ye heard וָאֶקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> not and I called אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עֲנִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6030><s%> you but ye answered

וְעָשִׂ֜יתִי <S%H6213><s%> Therefore will I do לַבַּ֣יִת ׀ <S%H1004><s%> unto [this] house אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which נִֽקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> which is called שְׁמִ֣י <S%H8034><s%> by my name עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> in אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you בֹּטְחִ֣ים <S%H982><s%> wherein ye trust בּ֔וֹ וְלַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I gave לָכֶ֖ם וְלַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> to you and to your fathers כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <S%H6213><s%> as I have done לְשִׁלֽוֹ׃ <S%H7887><s%> to Shiloh

וְהִשְׁלַכְתִּ֥י <S%H7993><s%> And I will cast you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> out פָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> of my sight כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> I הִשְׁלַ֙כְתִּי֙ <S%H7993><s%> as I have cast out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> all your brethren אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> [even] the whole seed אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim ס

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל ׀ <S%H6419><s%> Therefore pray בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> for them הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> not thou for this people הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשָּׂ֧א <S%H5375><s%> neither lift up בַעֲדָ֛ם <S%H1157><s%> up רִנָּ֥ה <S%H7440><s%> cry וּתְפִלָּ֖ה <S%H8605><s%> nor prayer וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּפְגַּע־ <S%H6293><s%> neither make intercession בִּ֑י כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵינֶ֥נִּי <S%H369><s%> not שֹׁמֵ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> to me for I will not hear אֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H853><s%>

הַֽאֵינְךָ֣ <S%H369><s%> not רֹאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> Seest מָ֛ה <S%H4100><s%> what הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> thou not what they do בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <S%H2351><s%> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

הַבָּנִ֞ים <S%H1121><s%> The children מְלַקְּטִ֣ים <S%H3950><s%> gather עֵצִ֗ים <S%H6086><s%> wood וְהָֽאָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> and the fathers מְבַעֲרִ֣ים <S%H1197><s%> kindle אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> and the women לָשׁ֣וֹת <S%H3888><s%> knead בָּצֵ֑ק <S%H1217><s%> [their] dough לַעֲשׂ֨וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to make כַּוָּנִ֜ים <S%H3561><s%> cakes לִמְלֶ֣כֶת <S%H4446><s%> to the queen הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְהַסֵּ֤ךְ <S%H5258><s%> and to pour out נְסָכִים֙ <S%H5262><s%> drink offerings לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> unto other לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> order הַכְעִסֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3707><s%> that they may provoke me to anger

הַאֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they מַכְעִסִ֖ים <S%H3707><s%> Do they provoke me to anger נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ? saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of בֹּ֥שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> [do they] not [provoke] themselves to the confusion פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> their own ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַפִּ֤י <S%H639><s%> Behold mine anger וַֽחֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> and my fury נִתֶּ֙כֶת֙ <S%H5413><s%> shall be poured out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> upon this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> upon man וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> and upon beast וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> and upon the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> and upon the fruit הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> of the ground וּבָעֲרָ֖ה <S%H1197><s%> and it shall burn וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִכְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H3518><s%> and shall not be quenched ס

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֹלוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5930><s%> your burnt offerings סְפ֥וּ <S%H5595><s%> Put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto זִבְחֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2077><s%> unto your sacrifices וְאִכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> and eat בָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> flesh

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not דִבַּ֤רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> For I spake אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> not unto your fathers וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or צִוִּיתִ֔ים <S%H6680><s%> nor commanded בְּי֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> them in the day [הֹוצִיא כ] (הֹוצִיאִ֥י <S%H3318><s%> after ק) אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> concerning עוֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וָזָֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> or sacrifices

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> But this thing הַ֠זֶּה <S%H2088><s%> this צִוִּ֨יתִי <S%H6680><s%> commanded אוֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> I them saying שִׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Obey בְקוֹלִ֔י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וְהָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> and I will be your God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֣י לְעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> and ye shall be my people וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <S%H1980><s%> and walk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> ye in all the ways אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲצַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> that I have commanded אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> that it יִיטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> you that it may be well לָכֶֽם׃

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> But they hearkened וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or הִטּ֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> not nor inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנָ֔ם <S%H241><s%> their ear וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> walked בְּמֹ֣עֵצ֔וֹת <S%H4156><s%> in the counsels בִּשְׁרִר֖וּת <S%H8307><s%> [and] in the imagination לִבָּ֣ם <S%H3820><s%> heart הָרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> of their evil וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> and went לְאָח֖וֹר <S%H268><s%> and went backward וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not לְפָנִֽים׃ <S%H6440><s%> and not forward

לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Since הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יָצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> came forth out אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> that your fathers מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> I have even sent אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> unto you all my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> rising up early וְשָׁלֹֽחַ׃ <S%H7971><s%> and sending

וְל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> Yet they hearkened אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or הִטּ֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> not unto me nor inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנָ֑ם <S%H241><s%> their ear וַיַּקְשׁוּ֙ <S%H7185><s%> but hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָרְפָּ֔ם <S%H6203><s%> their neck הֵרֵ֖עוּ <S%H7489><s%> they did worse מֵאֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> than their fathers

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֤ <S%H1696><s%> Therefore thou shalt speak אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> unto them but they will not hearken אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you וְקָרָ֥אתָ <S%H7121><s%> to thee thou shalt also call אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יַעֲנֽוּכָה׃ <S%H6030><s%> unto them but they will not answer

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> But thou shalt say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> to זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַגּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> unto them This [is] a nation אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> that obeyeth בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> not the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> their God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or לָקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> nor receiveth מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> correction אָֽבְדָה֙ <S%H6><s%> is perished הָֽאֱמוּנָ֔ה <S%H530><s%> truth וְנִכְרְתָ֖ה <S%H3772><s%> and is cut off מִפִּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> from their mouth ס

גָּזִּ֤י <S%H1494><s%> Cut off נִזְרֵךְ֙ <S%H5145><s%> thine hair וְֽהַשְׁלִ֔יכִי <S%H7993><s%> [O Jerusalem] and cast [it] away וּשְׂאִ֥י <S%H5375><s%> and take up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׁפָיִ֖ם <S%H8205><s%> on high places קִינָ֑ה <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for מָאַ֣ס <S%H3988><s%> hath rejected יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD וַיִּטֹּ֖שׁ <S%H5203><s%> and forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> the generation עֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5678><s%> of his wrath

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> have done בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> For the children יְהוּדָ֥ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in my sight נְאֻום־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שָׂ֣מוּ <S%H7760><s%> they have set שִׁקּֽוּצֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H8251><s%> their abominations בַּבַּ֛יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> which is called שְׁמִ֥י <S%H8034><s%> by my name עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> unto לְטַמְּאֽוֹ׃ <S%H2930><s%> to pollute

וּבָנ֞וּ <S%H1129><s%> And they have built בָּמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places הַתֹּ֗פֶת <S%H8612><s%> of Tophet אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בְּגֵ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> which [is] in the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom לִשְׂרֹ֛ף <S%H8313><s%> to burn אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> their sons בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> in the fire אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not צִוִּ֔יתִי <S%H6680><s%> which I commanded וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not עָלְתָ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> [them] not neither came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into לִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> it into my heart ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> Therefore behold the days בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יֵאָמֵ֨ר <S%H559><s%> that it shall no more be called ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer הַתֹּ֙פֶת֙ <S%H8612><s%> Tophet וְגֵ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> nor the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but גֵּ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> but the valley הַהֲרֵגָ֑ה <S%H2028><s%> of slaughter וְקָבְר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> for they shall bury בְתֹ֖פֶת <S%H8612><s%> in Tophet מֵאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> till there be no מָקֽוֹם׃ <S%H4725><s%> place

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become נִבְלַ֨ת <S%H5038><s%> And the carcases הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> of this people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> of this לְמַֽאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> shall be meat לְע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> for the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וּלְבֶהֱמַ֣ת <S%H929><s%> and for the beasts הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְאֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> and no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and none shall fray [them] away

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֣י ׀ <S%H7673><s%> Then will I cause to cease מֵעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> from the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּמֵֽחֻצוֹת֙ <S%H2351><s%> and from the streets יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> of mirth וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice שִׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> of gladness ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice חָתָ֖ן <S%H2860><s%> of the bridegroom וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice כַּלָּ֑ה <S%H3618><s%> of the bride כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <S%H2723><s%> shall be desolate תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> for the land
